price: Mu by’ukuri ikirere cyegereye isi twagitakishije inyenyeri.
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innā zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bizīnatin al-kawākibi
